channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Parking signs painted over AGAIN, 28th December
item.description:
Every few months someone (I believe it is the same person each time) comes and paints over all the parking signs in the area. Can you please do something to catch and prosecute them? This is such a waste of council time and causes parking chaos

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southborough Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Daily waste spilling on to the street, 28th December
item.description:
Every single day there is huge amount of waste piled against the brick wall connecting to a residential block. There is so much waste that people cannot access the accessibility ramp for wheelchairs or push chairs. The street has been stained with oil. There is broken glass and vomit extending round to Horsley Street. It appears that perhaps there is a black kitchen or similar down the back alley. The council cleaners come once in awhile and take away the black bags. But the waste needs to be managed appropriately by the surrounding businesses.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Arnside Street, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
